description:
This course is about financial accounting and statements. At the end of the course, students will be able to have a clear understanding about the different financial statements and how to record transactions in a practical transaction. There are 5 key sections in this course which are as follows:

1) What is accounting?

2) Why do we need accounting?

3) What are the basic financial accounting statements?

4) How do we record transactions?

5) What after accounting?

The concepts in the course is taught through some illustrations of practical transactions. We take a look at each transaction and see its impact on the financial statements.

After this course, you should be able to have a deep learning about financial statements that will be useful to you in front of your clients to talk intelligently about financial transactions. Also this is useful for you to help crack interviews for finance roles.

So dont wait and sign up for this course from Skillfin Learning.

Happy learning
title: Basics of financial accounting
